Package il.ac.hit.ViewModel

Class ViewModel

java.lang.Object
il.ac.hit.ViewModel.ViewModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFindNewGPA, ISimpleActions
public class ViewModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFindNewGPA
in charge of communication between the methods in the view and the methods in the model implements the IFindNewGPA interface

the interface used in this class

    • newGPA

      public java.lang.Double newGPA​(java.lang.String courseName, java.lang.Integer newGrade) throws DBActionsException
      calls the gpaByGrade method from the Calculations
      Specified by:
      newGPA in interface IFindNewGPA
      Parameters:
      courseName - correct name of the course that its grade would be replaced
      newGrade - new grade entered by the user to replace the precent grade in the calculation
      Returns:
      calculated total grade gpa
      Throws:
      DBActionsException - if an sql exception occurred
      See Also:
      - class with the gpa calculation methods
